review.author: Frontend (Agent Teams) + Architect (test constants)
review.findings: S96 auto-submit regression fix. 3 changes in injection.js: (1) Gemini path restored Enter — strips trailing \r from text, sends Enter separately via pty.write. (2) Removed pre-flight idle check from doSendToPane — processIdleQueue already handles idle timing, doSendToPane trusts the queue. (3) Focus failure retries once after 200ms, proceeds with Enter anyway instead of abandoning. Also: test mock constants aligned to production (5s/8s/10s), stale '60s' log message replaced with constant interpolation. 91 suites / 2914 tests passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
